name: Busted Bolts DEMO
description:
Busted Bolts Is a indie horror game that was an Idea for 2 years.

Play as a wind up toy clank trying to evacuate a factory over taken by living toys controlled by a super natural being.

Please Keep in mind this is a free early, first build demo so the game is not perfect and still won't be in the full version.

If you have any suggestions or would like to report a bug, please join my discord server.

https://discord.gg/ZjR3qMwwbs
